articles.title: Explained: Why RBI barred Amex, Diners Club from onboarding new customers - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Reserve Bank of India on Friday barred American Express and Diners Club International from on boarding new customers on their network following their non-compliance of data storage norms. Get latest Business online at cnbctv18.com

articles.title: Iconic McDonald's outlet in Ridout Tea Garden to shut in December after 32 years in operation - AsiaOne

articles.title: Falcon and The Winter Soldier Showrunner Working on Captain America 4 - ComingSoon.net
articles.description: Marvel is bringing back the Captain America film franchise. Per a report from The Hollywood Reporter, Disney and Marvel are having Malcolm Spellman develop the fourth installment in the series, which is tentatively called Captain America 4.
